CustomField.formula: IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "1000"),'Consumer Apartment Building', IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "1100"),'Consumer Single House', IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "4000"),'Project construction', IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "4100"),'Project renovation', IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "9000"),'Reseller project', IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "9100"),'Reseller consumer', IF(ISPICKVAL(Opportunity__r.Customer_Segment__c , "100"),'Other', NULL)))))))
CustomField.label: Customer segment name OLD
